title: Similar to French hand font
content:
Any one know what font this is? Was told it was used for a closed restaurant in Los Angeles...so we know the font exists...  
any help would be appreciated...

thanks!  
g

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820014417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MenuFont_6116.jpg)
author: steffendesign

comments.content:
It's not exact but E-phemera's [Coldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820014417/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ephemera/coldstyle/) is pretty close, and even comes with small caps.

- Mike Yanega

looks like its based on Fleishmann

Lineto’s Parragon is close but does not have the fabulous texture of your sample.

You could also try DTL’s Fleischmann:

[http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Fleischmann\_rdrct.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820014417/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Fleischmann_rdrct.html "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Fleischmann\_rdrct.html")
